name: The Outpost (antonsutherland)
description:
"The Outpost" - Immerse yourself in a gripping sci-fi adventure as you assume the role of a main character stationed at an isolated outpost on the red planet.

Players must unravel the mystery and survive the unknown terrors that lurk beyond the walls. Will you unravel the truth behind the outpost's crew disappearing? Find out in this intense and atmospheric thriller.

This is a short play test of the first level. More content is coming!

Created by: A. Malarev & Sutherlandgames  with MSU Assets
